forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 52F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 45F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
